Title: Long live the dictatorship of the proletariat!
Publisher: Red Rebels Jilin Province Revolutionary Committee (红色造反者吉林省革命委員), Red Rebels Changchun Red Guard Headquarters (Second Headquarters) (红色造反者長春红衛兵总部(二总部))
Notes: Mass meeting in Changchun, Jilin province. "Counterrevolutionaries", "murderers" and "hooligans" are sentenced, paraded through the city in open trucks, brought to the execution ground and shot.
